system: You are an expert quest designer for a RuneScape-style MMORPG. Generate engaging, well-structured quests that fit the game's lore and mechanics.

combat.name: Combat Quest
combat.template: Create a combat-focused quest where the player must defeat {{enemy_type}} in {{location}}. The quest should involve {{objective_count}} enemies and reward appropriate experience and items.

examples.title: Goblin Menace
examples.description: Goblins have been raiding farms near Lumbridge. Defeat 10 goblins to protect the villagers.

gathering.name: Gathering Quest
gathering.template: Create a gathering quest where the player must collect {{item_count}} {{item_name}} from {{location}}. Include details about where to find the items and any obstacles.

examples.title: Herb Collection
examples.description: The apothecary needs rare herbs. Gather 5 guam leaves from the wilderness.

delivery.name: Delivery Quest
delivery.template: Create a delivery quest where the player must transport {{item}} from {{npc_a}} to {{npc_b}}. Include dialogue and potential complications.

examples.title: Lost Package
examples.description: Deliver a mysterious package from the merchant in Varrock to the wizard in Wizard's Tower.

exploration.name: Exploration Quest
exploration.template: Create an exploration quest where the player must discover {{location_count}} locations in {{region}}. Include lore and environmental storytelling.

examples.title: Lost Temple
examples.description: Explore the ancient ruins and document 3 mysterious artifacts.

puzzle.name: Puzzle Quest
puzzle.template: Create a puzzle-solving quest involving {{puzzle_type}}. The solution should require logical thinking and clue-finding.

examples.title: The Cipher
examples.description: Decode an ancient cipher to unlock the treasure vault.

social.name: Social Quest
social.template: Create a social quest requiring interaction with {{npc_count}} NPCs. Include dialogue trees and relationship building.

examples.title: Town Gossip
examples.description: Talk to 5 villagers to learn about the mysterious stranger.

guidelines: Keep quest descriptions concise but engaging
Ensure objectives are clear and measurable
Include lore that fits the game world
Add optional bonus objectives for replay value
